subject: Re: [junit] how to unit test a class if it uses another singleton class
msgSnippet: I agree with User your singlettons wisely , but as a solution to the problem you are having, you could redesign the class using singletton to accept an
messageBody:
I agree with "User your singlettons wisely", but as a
solution to the problem you are having, you could
redesign the class using singletton to accept an
instance of the "singletton" as a parameter to
operation, constructor, ... Once you have done this,
you could for example to mock-up a class that
simulates Singletton's behaviour.

I guess it seems that I may have jumped the gun on
this one. Anyway, could you post more detail on
problems that you are experiencing ?

Later, Mikhail.


--- shailesh401 <skadam@...> wrote:
> Any help or suggestion
>
> Thanks
> Sal
